00025 struct ICMPState {
00026   std::ostream & Print(std::ostream &os) const { os <<"ICMPState()"; return os;}
00027 
00028   friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const ICMPState& L) {
00029     return L.Print(os);
00030   }
00031 };
00032 
00033 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00034 {
00035 
00036   MinetHandle ipmux;
00037   MinetHandle sock;
00038 
00039   ConnectionList<ICMPState> clist;
00040 
00041   MinetInit(MINET_ICMP_MODULE);
00042 
00043   ipmux=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MUX) ? MinetConnect(MINET_IP_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00044   sock=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00045 
00046   if (ipmux==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MUX)) {
00047     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to ipmux"));
00048     return -1;
00049   }
00050   if (sock==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE)) {
00051     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to sock_module"));
00052     return -1;
00053   }
00054 
00055 
00056   cerr << "icmp_module handling icmp traffic\n";
00057 
00058   MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("icmp_module handling icmp traffic"));
00059 
00060 
00061 
00062   MinetEvent event;
00063 
00064   while (MinetGetNextEvent(event)==0) {
00065     if (event.eventtype!=MinetEvent::Dataflow
00066         || event.direction!=MinetEvent::IN) {
00067       MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Unknown event ignored."));
00068     } else {
00069 
00070       if (event.handle==ipmux) {
00071         Packet p;
00072         MinetReceive(ipmux, p);
00073         p.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<ICMPHeader>(ICMP_HEADER_LENGTH);
00074 
00075         // received packet information
00076 #if DEBUG_RECV
00077         cerr << "Received ICMP/Packet: " << endl;
00078         DebugDump(p);
00079 #endif
00080 
00081         // respond to packet
00082         ICMPPacket response;
00083         response.respond(p);
00084 
00085         if (response.requires_reply())
00086           {
00087 #if DEBUG_RECV
00088             cerr << "Sent Packet: " << endl;
00089             DebugDump(response);  cerr << endl;
00090 #endif
00091             MinetSend(ipmux, response);
00092           }
00093         else
00094           {
00095             IPHeader iph = response.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00096             ICMPHeader icmph = response.FindHeader(Headers::ICMPHeader);
00097 
00098             // make new connection
00099             Connection c;
00100             iph.GetDestIP(c.dest);
00101             iph.GetSourceIP(c.src);
00102             iph.GetProtocol(c.protocol);
00103             c.srcport = PORT_NONE;
00104             c.destport = PORT_NONE;
00105 
00106             // ConnectionList<ICMPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(c);
00107             // if (cs!=clist.end()) {}
00108 
00109             Buffer data;  icmph.GetIphandIcmphEightBytes(response, data);
00110             data.AddBack(response.GetPayload());
00111             SockRequestResponse write(WRITE,
00112                                       c, //(*cs).connection,
00113                                       data,
00114                                       data.GetSize(),
00115                                       EOK);
00116 
00117 #if DEBUG_RECV
00118             cerr << "Forwarding ICMP Packet to Sock" << endl;
00119 #endif
00120             // not sure why this is happening -PAD
00121             MinetSend(sock,write);
00122           }
00123       }
00124 
00125       if (event.handle==sock) {
00126         SockRequestResponse req;
00127         MinetReceive(sock,req);
00128 
00129         switch (req.type) {
00130         case CONNECT:
00131           break;
00132         case ACCEPT:
00133           {
00134             // ignored, send OK response
00135             SockRequestResponse repl;
00136             // repl.type=SockRequestResponse::STATUS;
00137             repl.type=STATUS;
00138             repl.connection=req.connection;
00139             // buffer is zero bytes
00140             repl.bytes=0;
00141             repl.error=EOK;
00142             MinetSend(sock,repl);
00143           }
00144           break;
00145         case STATUS:
00146           // ignored, no response needed
00147           break;
00148         case WRITE:
00149           {
00150             // Not really clear what this is/was trying to do... -PAD
00151             //
00152             // FIXTHIS
00153             /*
00154               unsigned bytes = MIN(UDP_MAX_DATA, req.data.GetSize());
00155               // create the payload of the packet
00156               Packet p(req.data.ExtractFront(bytes));
00157               // Make the IP header first since we need it to do the udp checksum
00158               IPHeader ih;
00159               ih.SetProtocol(IP_PROTO_UDP);
00160               ih.SetSourceIP(req.connection.src);
00161               ih.SetDestIP(req.connection.dest);
00162               ih.SetTotalLength(bytes+UDP_HEADER_LENGTH+IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH);
00163               // push it onto the packet
00164               p.PushFrontHeader(ih);
00165               // Now build the UDP header
00166               // notice that we pass along the packet so that the udpheader can find
00167               // the ip header because it will include some of its fields in the checksum
00168               UDPHeader uh;
00169               uh.SetSourcePort(req.connection.srcport,p);
00170               uh.SetDestPort(req.connection.destport,p);
00171               uh.SetLength(UDP_HEADER_LENGTH+bytes,p);
00172               // Now we want to have the udp header BEHIND the IP header
00173               p.PushBackHeader(uh);
00174               MinetSend(mux,p);
00175

00178               repl.type=STATUS;
00179               repl.connection=req.connection;
00180               repl.bytes=bytes;
00181               repl.error=EOK;
00182               MinetSend(sock,repl);
00183             */
00184           }
00185           break;
00186         case FORWARD:
00187           {
00188             cout << "forward" << endl;
00189             ConnectionToStateMapping<ICMPState> m;
00190             m.connection=req.connection;
00191             // remove any old forward that might be there.
00192             ConnectionList<ICMPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(req.connection);
00193             if (cs!=clist.end()) {
00194               clist.erase(cs);
00195             }
00196             clist.push_back(m);
00197             SockRequestResponse repl;
00198             repl.type=STATUS;
00199             repl.connection=req.connection;
00200             repl.error=EOK;
00201             repl.bytes=0;
00202             MinetSend(sock,repl);
00203           }
00204           break;
00205         case CLOSE:
00206           {
00207             cout << "close" << endl;
00208             ConnectionList<ICMPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(req.connection);
00209             SockRequestResponse repl;
00210             repl.connection=req.connection;
00211             repl.type=STATUS;
00212             if (cs==clist.end()) {
00213               repl.error=ENOMATCH;
00214             } else {
00215               repl.error=EOK;
00216               clist.erase(cs);
00217             }
00218             MinetSend(sock,repl);
00219           }
00220           break;
00221         default:
00222           {
00223             cout << "default" << endl;
00224             SockRequestResponse repl;
00225             repl.type=STATUS;
00226             repl.error=EWHAT;
00227             MinetSend(sock,repl);
00228           }
00229         }
00230       }
00231     }
00232   }
00233 
00234   MinetDeinit();
00235   return 0;
00236 }
